    • Constructor Detail

      • Paddle

        public Paddle(int x,
      int y,
      int height,
      int width,
      int frameWidth)
        Generate new Paddle with the given attributes.
        Parameters:
        x - initial x position
        y - initial y position
        height - paddle height
        width - paddle width
        frameWidth - width of the frame

    • Method Detail

      • getCenter

        public int getCenter()
        Returns:
        returns the center x position of the paddle

      • changeSize

        public void changeSize(int amount)
        Increase or decrease paddles size according to the amount, paddle can't be larger or smaller than the max/min width.
        Parameters:
        amount - how much paddle should be increased or decreased

      • move

        public void move(int x)
        Move the paddle according to movement adjustment, after which check position.
        Parameters:
        x - how much the paddle should move, negative value to move left, positive to right

      • dockPaddle

        public void dockPaddle()
        When docked is set to true paddle follows mouse movements

      • undockPaddle

        public void undockPaddle()
        Stop following mouse

      • docked

        public boolean docked()
        Returns:
        if false paddle is stationary else following mouse

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int pos)
